thread.title: Curitiba's Batel

title: Curitiba's Batel
text:
Only registered TrekEarth members may write critiques. Photographer's Note 
Here I was at the rooftop of my hotel (Harbour Batel Hotel). Besides the bad time it have a pretty view of the Batel neightborhood. I like the many times of architecture. On the workshop you can see another photo took from the same place. Large view click HERE See workshop for complementary Photo I and Photo II . What photo did you prefer? The Batel neighborhood is known as the second center of Curitiba. It is a residential neighborhood with many buildings, but also has a wide range of shops from various sectors as well as restaurants, hotels and three big shopping centers. the name Batel comes from the Latin word battelum and, strictly speaking, it means small boat or canoe. 
Nobody has marked this note useful
